name: Tower Rebellion
description:
In the world of Tower Rebellion you need to pay a bit more attention to your towers than usual.
Sure they will defeat some enemies for you, but make sure they keep doing their job or else they might start wandering around instead of defending your base.

You'll need quick management skills or else you might find yourself out of control.


Created by iprE, corruptedhelios and kcranberry
Made as part of the GMTK Game-Jam 2020
